title: Leblanc is absolute cancer.
body: Fuck that champion. That is all.

replies.body:
Crap they discovered Leblanc. Welp, time to call in the Reapers to end this cycle.

....

Leblanc hasn't been an issue for a couple of years.
She's just the latest board bitch. I was wondering who'd be after Yasuo.
Yasuo still is. Boards have matured to the point where we can have _two_ board bitches. :3
Lets see if we can add a 3rd. Fuck fizz.
No, Fizz is in the hall of fame. We aren't allowed to talk about him because it ends up being redundant.

silly, q is a single target spell,it doesnt work on an entire team, assuming you have 1 min of time, waiting everytime for q to come back up , and q'ng every enemy
Well played. This is the type of response I'd give so i feel like it's deserved retribution.
step three: watch helplessly as she gets kills on bot/top because she has superior mobility
But who is that champion?
"He's the hero mid lane deserves, but not the one it needs right now"..."he's not our hero. He's a silent guardian, a watchful protector. A dark knight."

Sion works even better
Because his pushing is better in the earlygame :)

then you grab cowl asap and win lane
That too, I have just never done or seen sion mid.

mid is arguably his best position

with strong waveclear high base damage and lots of cc he can make quick work of almost any mage/assassin.

especially if your jungler ganks
and the poke is really strong too

His roams are also some of the best and from mid you can roam anywhere
Please don't tell that to people. I don't want to play against Sion mid.

people cry about leblanc like clockwork man. she's fine. if you don't know by now when she's going to 100-0 you, and what to counterpick/counterbuild her with, it's your own damn fault for losing to her. protip

leblancs level 1 is so shit you can most likely harass her out of early, get a level lead, and then stomp her when she runs back
So the age old, "Assassin has no counterplay, so counterpick them instead."?
LB has unreasonably high bases/ratios, higher than ANY MID LANER except Viktor when he lands his whole R

> [{quoted}](name=Verdade,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=R5byEFJX,comment-id=001a0000,timestamp=2016-08-02T17:41:56.000+0000)
>
> LB has unreasonably high bases/ratios, higher than ANY MID LANER except Viktor when he lands his whole R

yeah, and hse also can't cs for shit, so all you have to do is shove her lane, don't feed her, and she sucks.

lissandra, diana, yasuo just these 3 have the potential to beat her before AND after 6. 

{{champion:268}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:43}} {{champion:34}} are all skill based matchups. 

leblanc has been this way since her silence got removed, and literally now crybabies want to complain about her.

As bad as LB is, I'd rather lane against her than Zed, Yasuo, or Fizz.

She has high cds- take advantage of them. And also, most of her abilities are skillshots, so learning how to kite them is important (and yeah, it can be hard).
She has high cooldowns, back off when she uses her Q. After her burst combo she's easy to take down if you can kill her in less than 11 seconds

Her Q is a flat 6s CD with no CDR and marks the target for 3.5s. I get to have 2.5s of not being zoned early game?

Her W is 18/16/14/12/10 which is admittedly rather long early game, but late game it's down to 6s with 40% CDR which isn't an uncommon build with Morello (20%), Zhonya's (10%), and Abyssal (10%)

Her E is 14/12.5/11/9.5/8, but her CD isn't the issue with her E. It's the bonkers tether range and hit box.

Her ult CD is completely obscene though. 40/32/24. RANK 1, 40 SECONDS. NO MANA COST. There's absolutely no reason for this to be manaless anymore with the new mage items like Lost Chapter. Her Rank 3 ult is 14 seconds with 40% CDR. Why.

because she would not work well with a high ultimate cooldown. Additionally it is a mimicked spell, not an ultimate. During the lategame she could almost do nothing, and during the early game the cooldown is high enough. Maybe you should try it by yourself multiple times instead of flaming a champion that could be adjusted somewhere.
And yes, I play her. A lot. And I am not flaming any champion if I lose "because of it ~~me~~"

You know what other Assassins have to do? Wait for their ultimates to kill somebody late game. Zed needs his ultimate late game which is an 80 second cooldown which goes down to 48 seconds rank 3, 40% CDR, longer than Leblanc's rank 1 ultimate. Talon needs his ultimate to kill people. LeBlanc doesn't even need to hit someone with her full kit damage since she normally uses W just to get in range, she pops people with just QRE.

It wouldn't be an ultimate if it didn't make the last spell stronger on top of being free and on a short CD, but alas, it does. Casting a better version of one of your other spells for free sounds pretty 'ultimate' to me, even if it's not a whole new spell like other champions.

Talon and Zed don't need their ultimate to kill somone. LeBlanc _does_ need it. And she needs it for waveclear, while Talon and Zed have their basic attacks and spells.
Obviously you do not understand her kit mechanics. There are possibilities to change her way to deal damage, but it does not mean that she is too strong.
It's ridiculous that it's manaless. Also don't try to talk it down as just mimicking one of her spells. It does increased damage with retarded AP ratios

Increased damage?? An ultamite which does more damage than qwe spells? Riot fucked up nerf plz

ulti less than 18 seconds with 45% CD midgame. W less than 6 seconds. Q even less than that. those, are not high CD's. maybe right at the beginning of the game but it scales down very quickly and since Morello is the rush item on her (20% CD) those "high cooldowns" get taken down very quickly.

> ulti less than 18 seconds with 45% CD midgame. W less than 6 seconds. Q even less than that. those, are not high CD's. maybe right at the beginning of the game but it scales down very quickly and since Morello is the rush item on her (20% CD) those "high cooldowns" get taken down very quickly.

When she goes in for the kill (W) is when she's most vulnerable because she is very squishy, even with mirror image.  There are many champs that can deal with her.  Laning phase she's one of those champs that you stay away from unless she uses her W a couple times and gets mana screwed.  Her weakness is she is a horrible pusher, and the range on her W and Q gets her too close to certain burst champions that can outright kill her.
How does this shit get upvoted.... Nothing constructive and it's just a post to whine
Because leblanc is freelo and it pisses people off

Great arguement, I completely agree. Allow me to give my thoughts.

She's got a safe laning phase due to her attack range and blink. She has a long range blink, meaning no counterplay. Her blink is on a low cooldown, meaning impossible to chase down mid game. She has extremely high damage that has no counterplay unless you have a dash and time it right. She has instant massive burst, so instant not even a Kayle could ult it. With 40% CDR and Rylai's she can triple root someone who is melee, but has to use ult (not like that matters).

double root, she can only cast her e once, and then use her ult as another root, to secure the root

also kayle can beat her pretty easly, all he has to do is wait for her to use her ult, and w, and ult at the right time,then she cant run away, and destroyer her with a  q and some e attacks, or even ignite if you have that, also to clairify, kayle vs lb , you should never go melee, to creeps, that's easy harass for lb

last but not least, she has counterplay, if lb misses her w and her ult is down, she has got no where to run, her e isnt easy to aim, its not an auto skill that goes on your enemy, its a skillshot , so if lb gets caught out , and her w is down , she wont be able to get away,assuming her ult is down, or she used another skill

And lost but not least, **STOP TAKING MELEE CHAMPS MID **, i cant stress enough about this , you are playing a melee champ, someone who has to get up close, next to lb to do damadge, lb has such an easy time to e you, q you , w you, and kill you, you are asking to get destroyed by picking it, atleast pick something viable, that can win against her

honestly , you are retarted for even thinking a melee champ , has an advantage vs lb, its like syndra vs a draven mid, i can q + e , pick up the q drop it on him, while he's stunned, and ult, and its a dead draven.
Who says they have to be melee champions who are mid? You're top laner who tries to fight leblanc can't because of her perma-root.

uhm , i have never seen a lb top, also its rare, so because you have seen a lb top and lost
by that logic, because she went top and beat you , we must nerf her root ? 


seems legit >_>"
Don't pick a melee mid? Great, just let me unpick Talon real quick because I can totally do that. Sometimes the enemy picks after you do...

You'd think this as a non-leblanc player. I hate her too, she counters a lot of mid lane picks and is extremely hard to gank, but if you get to play her you'll actually  see it's not all that sweet. You may be winning lane phase cause it's easy to nuke someone by facerolling on keyboard but mid-late game.. well that's something else, it takes some practice and mechanics knowledge to be useful.
LeBlanc is lane bully one of the few that arent broken. Easy to counter, easy to win against.  Anyone saying shes OP or anything needs to re think their understanding of the game. I dont play her btw
so cancer

As someone who plays a fair bit of LB. (Have been here since season 1)

1: Push the wave. Her CSing pre 6 is garbage, and having to blow a 25 second CD to fully wave clear MAYBE (W-R) hurts her all in potential on you for that time. 

2: Play Orianna, Max E, get MR. Congrats she does NOTHING to you. 

3: In the event you get counter picked, play safe. it takes a while for her to push because her clear is awful. So the minions stack up really fast on her end, let her push into your tower, clear as much as you can, repeat. It'll seem like you're far behind but so long as you can last hit under turret or have someone with decent level 3-6 wave clear you'll only be maybe 20CS down at max which isn't bad all things considered.

4: If you're not confident in the match up, try and switch rolls with someone, or in game, go top lane (Depending on the impending matchup that would be).

5: I can't stress this enough. DON'T. LET. HER. ROAM. If she's ahead of you, don't put your team in danger (Looking at you bot lane, don't worry I gotchu). Make sure that if she DOES roam, you push that wave as fast as you absolutely can making her miss 1-3 waves, and if she looks like shes going to roam, burn spells on her in a quick rotation and get out before she can react. Keeps her in that lane and she's to low to roam.

hey I was right I said lb or Zed would be the next wave of QQ threads after Yasuo lol

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/ePIdmmtp-brace-yourselves-yasuo-mains-the-the-yasuo-qq-threads-are-back

it's just a dumb champion design. very high base damage, very low cooldowns eventually. very good scaling.
the passive is just dumb also. it's too forgiving for all that she has. because if 1 time she gets CCed on time and caught, then that stupid passive which is on like.. 40 seconds cooldown, gets activated and 50% of the time she will run away, though end game her W will be up already for her to go out.
there are countless things that experienced {{champion:7}}  player can do to outplay enemy.

to me she is like zed. you HAVE to rush {{item:1057}}  with MR runes, otherwise you will get one shot. even if you have MR you still will die after a bit of poke from her W and Q.

fun fact: She has to do that too in several matchups because she is squishy and a smart player can easily outtrade her.
Although I understand your frustration, _you_ should also try to understand the other side.
